channel.title: Half price Business of Software Conference tickets for bootstrappers/startups
channel.description:
Wanted to let this group be the first to know that Twilio and Balsamiq, supporters of Business of Software Conference, are helping to support attendance at Business of Software Conference, Boston, 15-17th September with a 50% discount on attendance - some terms apply.
http://businessofsoftware.org/2014/08/a-startup-by-any-other-name-very-limited-half-price-tickets-for-business-of-software-conference-from-balsamiq-twilio/
